data.name: Ahro
data.detailed_description:
Ahro, named after it’s main character, is a meditative 2D side-scrolling adventure game set in a subdued yet stylized pre-modern world. It's focused on exploration, atmosphere, and story. In the game, Ahro can release his spirit and travel into the sky to collect items as well as reach places unreachable by walking. The game takes place in a very well considered fictional world full of history and lore.
The story starts when Ahro begins having distressing and frequent breakdown episodes. After finding only mild relief from herbal medicine, he sets out to find a legendary miracle cure.

Fly to Collect

Explore to Discover

Fly to Travel

Fly to Collect

Explore to Discover

Fly to Travel
data.short_description: Adventure, explore, release your spirit to fly, and search for what you seek as you journey through Ahro's subdued yet stylized world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game controller recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.11 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 755M
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game controller recommended

Recommended:
